Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, we're confident it's worth every penny. Considering its exceptional worth, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500 for you. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at an attractive discount. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
